data.message: Im just a Brazilian fan of you since I was 7 years old when my uncle put a CD of yours to play in his car, and then it was just pure love and inspiration by your song in my life! Now im 20 years old and had the great oppotunity (wich i never thought i would have) to watch and see you performing... thank you for realizing my dream to see you in "skin and bones". EMINEM, slim shady, marshall, for life ! love you doug ! <3 only those who been there know what its like.
